sentences.sentence: Tetra Fino; delivery system; secondary packaging;
sentences.translation: 利乐枕； 输送系统； 二次包装；

sentences.sentence: Fragrant aromas of acacia flowers, roasted nuts and buttered citrus are neatly balanced with underlying hints of bees wax, minerals, chalk and fino.
sentences.translation: 此酒带有花，果仁和奶油，柑橘平衡芬芳与蜂蜡、矿物、白垩香味，口感清新。
